Event Highlights
The fun continues all year long at Epperson Lagoon and we invite you to check out our full calendar of activities. Events are included with the purchase of a day pass unless ticket price is noted.
Cigar Night
Friday, September 5 | 7pm
Meet us in Cabana Cove to enjoy a cigar and live music from 7pm-10pm.
This event is open to the public. Both Resident Members and non-Resident Members must register for this event.
Public RSVP
Resident Member RSVP
Football SUN-Days
Every Sunday | 1pm
It’s football season! We’re celebrating every Sunday at the Lagoon. Every week, you will have a chance to win incredible prizes like gift cards, fan gear, team merch, and even game day tickets! All you have to do is show up! Plus, get a multi-day pass to enjoy each Football Sunday in paradise!
Learn more and Get Tickets
MetroLagoons is proud to partner with local food truck vendors to bring even more flavor and variety to your Lagoon day. Enjoy these options as well as our regular on-site food and beverage options!
Explore Upcoming Food Trucks

Lagoon Living Has Its Perks
You can live your best life as a resident member of Epperson. Resident members have full access to a vibrant beachfront lifestyle where each day feels like a vacation, and a year-round calendar full of community events and entertainment.
Live at Epperson

Tags
Event Highlights
The fun continues all year long at Mirada Lagoon and we invite you to check out our full calendar of activities. Events are included with admission unless ticket price is noted.
Luau Night
Saturday, September 6 | 7pm
Enjoy an exciting Polynesian stage show with dancers and live music, including hula, fire, knife, and audience participation dances. Plus, meet the performers before and after the show! Guests are encouraged to bring your own beach chair or blanket to soak in the island vibes.
Football SUN-Days
Every Sunday | 1pm
It’s football season! We’re celebrating every Sunday at the Lagoon. Every week, you will have a chance to win incredible prizes like gift cards, fan gear, team merch, and even game day tickets! All you have to do is show up! Plus, get a multi-day pass to enjoy each Football Sunday in paradise!
Learn more and Get Tickets
MetroLagoons is proud to partner with local food truck vendors to bring even more flavor and variety to your Lagoon day. Enjoy these options as well as our regular on-site food and beverage options!
Explore Upcoming Food Trucks

Lagoon Living Has Its Perks
You can live your best life as a resident member of Mirada. Resident members have full access to a vibrant beachfront lifestyle where each day feels like a vacation, and a year-round calendar full of community events and entertainment.
Live at Mirada

Event Highlights
The fun continues all year long at Mirada Lagoon and we invite you to check out our full calendar of activities. Events are included with admission unless ticket price is noted.
Luau Night
Saturday, September 6 | 7pm
Enjoy an exciting Polynesian stage show with dancers and live music, including hula, fire, knife, and audience participation dances. Plus, meet the performers before and after the show! Guests are encouraged to bring your own beach chair or blanket to soak in the island vibes.
Football SUN-Days
Every Sunday | 1pm
It’s football season! We’re celebrating every Sunday at the Lagoon. Every week, you will have a chance to win incredible prizes like gift cards, fan gear, team merch, and even game day tickets! All you have to do is show up! Plus, get a multi-day pass to enjoy each Football Sunday in paradise!
Learn more and Get Tickets
MetroLagoons is proud to partner with local food truck vendors to bring even more flavor and variety to your Lagoon day. Enjoy these options as well as our regular on-site food and beverage options!
Explore Upcoming Food Trucks
don't miss moments
